title: Chaos or Order (Poll)
body: I hate riven mains so i gotta go with chaos lul

replies.body: I hate both Yasuo and Riven mains....but I hate demons even more, so Angle Order all the way.
dam i just saw that lol
U hate Riven mains more than Yasuo mains?
most yas mains in silver/gold are really bad, so its really easy to outplay them. if a riven reaches you in any way, you are usually dead. Well at least i'm usually dead bc im bad xd
